zh_HK {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%z%c%T%s%b%e%r" }
    }
    AmPmMarkers { 
            "\u4E0A\u5348",
            "\u4E0B\u5348",
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "HK$",
            "HKD ",
            ".",
    }
    DateTimePatterns { 
            "aa hh:mm:ss",
            "hh\u6642mm\u5206ss\u79D2 z",
            "hh\u6642mm\u5206ss\u79D2 z",
            "hh\u6642mm\u5206ss\u79D2 z",
            "yyyy\u5E74MMM\u6708dd\u65E5 EEEE",
            "yyyy\u5E74MMM\u6708dd\u65E5 aa hh:mm:ss",
            "yyyy\u5E74MMM\u6708dd\u65E5 EEEE",
            "yyyy\u5E74MMM\u6708dd\u65E5 EEEE",
            "{1} {0}",
    }
    DayAbbreviations { 
            "\u65E5 ",
            "\u4E00 ",
            "\u4E8C ",
            "\u4E09 ",
            "\u56DB ",
            "\u4E94 ",
            "\u516D ",
    }
    DayNames { 
            "\u661F\u671F\u65E5 ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u4E00 ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u4E8C ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u4E09 ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u56DB ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u4E94 ",
            "\u661F\u671F\u516D ",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Chinese language locale for Hong Kong" }
        Source { "IBM Globalization Center of Competency, Yamato Software Laboratory" }
        Address { "1623-14, Shimotsuruma, Yamato-shi, Kanagawa-ken, 242-8502, Japan" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Chinese" }
        Territory { "Hong Kong" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-07-20" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[yY\u662F]" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN\u4E0D\u5426]" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    MonthAbbreviations { 
            "1\u6708",
            "2\u6708",
            "3\u6708",
            "4\u6708",
            "5\u6708",
            "6\u6708",
            "7\u6708",
            "8\u6708",
            "9\u6708",
            "10\u6708",
            "11\u6708",
            "12\u6708",
            "",
    }
    MonthNames { 
            "\u4E00\u6708",
            "\u4E8C\u6708",
            "\u4E09\u6708",
            "\u56DB\u6708",
            "\u4E94\u6708",
            "\u516D\u6708",
            "\u4E03\u6708",

            "\u5341\u6708",
            "\u5341\u4E00\u6708",
            "\u5341\u4E8C\u6708",
            "",
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%f%t%d1" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "\u5148\u751F" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "\u5C0F\u59D0" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "\u592B\u4EBA." }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "\u5973\u58EB" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;(\u00A4#,##0.00)",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    PaperSize { 
        Hieght { "297" }
        Width { "210" }
        Units { "mm" }
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c ;%a ;%l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "852" }
    }
}
